entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
